channel.title: [Delta]Something wrong with this code?

item.title: [Delta]Something wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:1, topic:396173”]Well I put this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }
So my compiler says:

[quote].\src\Client.java:1075: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable DCdown
location: class Client
DCdown = 4;
^
.\src\Client.java:1076: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable DCDamg
location: class Client
DCDamg = true;
^
.\src\Client.java:1877: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable DCdown
location: class Client
DCdown = 4;
^
.\src\Client.java:1878: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable DCDamg
location: class Client
DCDamg = true;
^
4 errors
Press any key to continue…
[/quote]
I am using DeltaClean[Optimized].

Thanks,
Arham[/quote]
What item is it?

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Something wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:396173”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=493344.msg3607078#msg3607078 date=1306195034]
You need to add the methods& or Int’s for DCDamg& DCDown.
[/quote]
Could you give me a code please?[/quote]
I don’t have it?
You need to add the methods for them.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Something wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Well I put this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }
So my compiler says:

.\src\Client.java:1075: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class Client DCdown = 4; ^ .\src\Client.java:1076: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCDamg location: class Client DCDamg = true; ^ .\src\Client.java:1877: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class Client DCdown = 4; ^ .\src\Client.java:1878: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCDamg location: class Client DCDamg = true; ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue...
I am using DeltaClean[Optimized].

Thanks,
Arham

Read full topic
